Title: Relates to annual reports by lobbyists disclosing clients that they advocated on behalf of before any state or local governmental entity
Summary: Requires lobbyists to provide annual reports disclosing clients that they have advocated on behalf of before any state or local governmental entity.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to annual reports by lobbyists disclosing clients that they advocated on behalf of before any state or local governmental entity
